Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-UPDATE-DEVICE.indication primitive. See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.4.2, page 461.

Definition at line 121 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_UpdateDeviceInd_t::srcAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device originating the update-device command.

Definition at line 125 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_UpdateDeviceInd_t::deviceAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device whose status is being updated.

Definition at line 128 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

APS_UpdateDeviceStatus_t APS_UpdateDeviceInd_t::status

This parameter Indicates the updated status of the device given by the deviceAddress parameter.

Definition at line 131 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

ShortAddr_t APS_UpdateDeviceInd_t::deviceShortAddress

[LE] The 16-bit network address of the device whose status is being updated.
